name: Dinner with the Devil
description:
This game was made for use in the Epic Megajam. Defeat the Ghosts by shooting them with the priest (light character) then eat the weakened souls with the demon (dark character).

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to Flip the stage
  • LMB to shoot (priest) or pounce (Demon)
  • P to pause and unpause.

Assets created prior to jam

  • All music is original, but was created prior to the jam
  • Sound FX were sourced from Dynamedion (we<3Indies)
